body.p: Accordingly, in recognising and measuring its deferred tax liability applying IAS 12 at the end of Year 1, Entity B calculates a taxable temporary difference based on the most likely amount of the tax base of CU90 (CU100 – CU10) to reflect the effect of the uncertainty, instead of the tax base calculated based on Entity B’s income tax filing (CU0).
